Fun and stuff. Fall 2014 and early 2015 was my favorite period of time to play, but it's a completely different game now. I had about 1,000 hours by the start of 2016 and at the time of writing this about a month from 2020 I have 2676 hours. Just goes to show that even though it's completely different from the game it used to be it's still worth getting.
